TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content: so, I heard a lot of people using this force opengl thing to use a lot of mods. How do I do this?
It's Ask the Moderators, not Ask the Modders. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

> 
> It's Ask the Moderators, not Ask the Modders. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

I was thinking that surely the moderators would know as well...

**THIS WORKS IF YOU USE STEAM**

If you are using Steam, you simply open up the properties, then under the "general properties" tag, click the button that says "Set launch options..." A new dialogue window will pop up with the warning that it is to be used by advanced users only. Haha, always get a good laugh out of this one... ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Enter exactly "-force-opengl" close, then close steam and enter back into it. Start KSP like you normally would.

> 
> It's Ask the Moderators, not Ask the Modders. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

Hey, top banana - don't be upset, I got your um, back...peel...top... Um, no biggie, I answered it if it's about the Steam version... ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
